text: Ryan Joseph Newman (born December 8, 1977) is an American racecar driver who drives the No. 51 Ford Mustang for Rick Ware Racing. Newman used to drive the No. 39 Chevrolet Impala for Stewart Haas Racing, and the No. 12 Dodge for Team Penske. Newman won the 2008 Daytona 500. ==References== Category:NASCAR drivers Category:1977 births Category:Daytona 500 winners Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Indiana Category:People from South Bend, Indiana Category:Living people
title: Ryan Newman (racing driver)
